name: Monsters Survivors
description:
BULLET-HELL, SHOOTER AND DIFFICULT

Get ready for an intense, heart-pumping experience in this 3D shooter game! 

In this game you kill the monsters to level up and be more powerful.

Over time, the game becomes more difficult.

This game is also perfect for training your aim and dodging skills.

Challenge yourself NOW!

CONTROLS Move WASD Shooting LMB

It is a prototype game made by kamach
